name: diplomacy656
short_description:
CSIS656 - Project Diplomacy
A heterogeneous application made up of multiple inter-operating components. The goal is to make a robust, easy to maintain architecture that recreates as accurately as possible the experience of Avalon Hill's board game Diplomacy (www.wizards.com/avalonhill/rules/diplomacy.pdf). All efforts are made to ensure the limitations and allowances afforded by the game's rules.

Recreating this game is allowable under Hasbro's fair use so long as it a class project and not redistributed for profit.
summary: 656 Class project for an online version of the game of Diplomacy.
